description: Every so often we have these types of guys come through Divine Bitches, you know the type, they beg to be put on the website to get dommed by a beautiful woman but when faced with the reality they act like macho assholes. Don't worry hunnie, we don't care, we'll just put a box on your head, fuck you in the ass like the little bitch you are then put it on the internet for all your friends to see! Merry Christmas!!!
title: A Christmas Bitch
